TopicTitle: How many copies of the game have you bought (friends, family, etc.)?

Articles.Content:
I picked KSP up about a year ago on a Steam sale, and immediately bought a second copy for a close friend who tends to play these things together. Since then I've bought four more copies for friends to get them playing, just to get them over the "But it's early access..." fears that they'd waste their money and not have fun.

So I've bought half a dozen copies in total, will probably buy more as time goes on and I continue to spread to gospel of Kerbal.

How about you?
I've bought like 4 of them at the least. 1 for me, 1 for my brother, and 2 I got when it was on sale just in case I wanna give it to someone later.
